name: Strange Orchardist
description:
Harvest ripely fruits from an orchard on a strange planet. Leap from grassy hill to ceiling, and skate frozen surfaces.

But beware! Time is short. These fruits will spoil if you dally. And spoilt fruit means death, of course.

Controls:

  • JUMP - click or press space to jump towards the mouse
  • SPEED JUMP - jump immediately after landing
  • MID-AIR DASH - click or press space immediately after collecting a fruit
  • RESTART LEVEL - Press “r”
